Package com.fssa.freshnest.dao

Class InviteDAO

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.freshnest.dao.InviteDAO
public class InviteDAO extends Object
This class provides data access methods to interact with the invite database table.
Author:
SusikumarPitchaimuth

  • Method Details

    • createInvite

      public boolean createInvite(Invite invite) throws DAOException
      Creates a new invite record in the database.
      Parameters:
      invite - The Invite object containing invite information to be created.
      Returns:
      True if the invite is successfully created, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • updateInvite

      public boolean updateInvite(Invite invite) throws DAOException
      Updates an existing invite record in the database.
      Parameters:
      invite - The Invite object containing updated invite information.
      Returns:
      True if the invite information is successfully updated, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • deleteInvite

      public boolean deleteInvite(Invite invite) throws DAOException
      Marks an invite as deleted in the database.
      Parameters:
      invite - The Invite object containing invite information to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the invite is successfully marked as deleted, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • listInvites

      public List<Invite> listInvites(Invite invite) throws DAOException
      Retrieves a List of stills belonging to a specific user from the database.
      Parameters:
      invite - The invite object containing the user id for which to retrieve invitation.
      Returns:
      A list of invitation objects associated with user.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

      public List<Invite> listFriendsInvite(Invite invite) throws DAOException

      DAOException
